author: Zhang, YC
adress: Sixth Peoples Hosp Qingdao, Dept Hepatol 7, Qingdao, Shandong, Peoples R China
title: Increased Expression of Serine Hydroxymethyltransferase 2 (SHMT2) is a Negative Prognostic Marker in Patients with Hepatocellular Carcinoma and is Associated with Proliferation of HepG2 Cells
